亃字的基本解释

亃
lǐn
古同“忧”。

亃
lìn
古书上说的一种兽名黄身白尾。

亃字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lǐn］
［《集韻》里忍切，上軫，來。］
忧愁；烦忧。
[②]［lìn］
［《五音集韻》良刃切］
一种似彘的野兽。

亃字的康熙字典解释

【子集上】【乙字部】　亃； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页85第01
【集韻】里忍切，吝上聲。憂也。　又【五音集韻】良忍切，獸名。似彘，身黃尾白。

亃字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
亃字的起名意思

暂无。

亃
Basic explanation of words
亃
lǐn
Gu Tong "worry".
亃
lìn
The name of a kind of beast said in ancient books is yellow body and white tail.
亃
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lǐn］
[In "Jiyun", please bear with me, go to Zhen, come. ]
Worry; worry.
[②]［lìn］
["Five Yin Jiyun" Good Blade Cut]
A beast that resembles a lump.
亃
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[First Subset] [B Department of Words] 　亃; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 85 01
[Jiyun] Reluctantly and stingly said. Worry too.　[Pentagram Rhyme] Liang Renqie, the name of the beast. It looks like a scorpion, with a yellow body and a white tail.
